channel.title: How i change runes needed for spells?
channel.description: At the moment say if i cast ice burst on a guard it works but when im pkin it says i need ecto token death and that.. same with blood rush. Help please? :)

thats just on that version, other versions might include coding like “removeitemid <=(ID))”
:l

}
